title: Clay Eichler Memorial Fund appreciates Thundertix and Pam!Ei
name: Gail E.
comments:
Comments: We started a non profit in 2014. I have volunteered in a lot of areas over my years, but I've never been one of the main people behind starting a non profit much less throwing a concert and golf scramble in the same day. With a lot of amazing help from friends our events were successful. I credit thundertix with the ease of getting information to supporters. This kept our contributors in the know, they knew when to expect their tickets to be emailed. We started solitciting money 6 months before our event. They input all the sponsorships, donations, ticket purchases, golf registrations, tshirt sales, etc. into thundertix. We were very hesitant at first, but with multiple calls to Pam initially and very frequently later, we are smooth sailing.She only showed concern and kindness when we called. This is so needed in our world today. I would recommend this to anyone who is selling tickets to an event.

The availability to contact your donors is at your fingertips. We decided to email tickets to customers 2 weeks before our event. We send an email right away, to let them know we have received their sponsorship, thank them for it and let them know when to expect their tickets. It makes it so easy for everyone. The supporters and in our case, our volunteers.

I spent many hours looking at different options and I know we made the right choice.

The customer service from Pam is more than it's weight in gold. I am not kidding, she could help with every issue. This is only our 3rd year to use the software, in this time period, there have been several "upgrades".

One other thing that made it really nice for us, especially as beginners, is the compatibility between thundertix and our credit card payment system. In 2 years we have given back $265,000.00 to our community. There has been a lot of information submitted in Thundertix.

title: ThunderTix continually provides outstanding service!
name: Alecia O.
comments: Comments: I was lucky enough to have found ThunderTix when I worked for The Cider Mill Playhouse in Endicott, New York, almost ten years ago. Stacy Chapman helped me learn the system and how to easily customize it for our oddly shaped (half circle thrust) theater. Our older, not-so-computer-savvy customers found it to be extremely user friendly and it really streamlined the box office experience too! Two years ago I became the Marketing Director for the Chenango Arts Council in Norwich, New York, whose ticketing system was really in need of updating. I suggested we look into ThunderTix, recalling the positive experience I had in the past. Stacy Chapman was still with the company and had gotten a well deserved promotion, but she remembered me from the Cider Mill! And I remembered her of course, because she was so helpful and proactive. The ThunderTix system proved to be exactly what we needed. Stacy once again held my hand through the set-up process, even though it wasn't really her job anymore. Pam Mason has also been extremely helpful, and our audience feedback reveals their experience just gets more and more enjoyable. What prompts me to write this is the almost uncanny ability ThunderTix has in predicting what I'm going to need next. The old seat blocking function allowed me to block our season subscribers' favorite seats so we could go online to the general public for ticket sales earlier than usual, which was great! But I faced the laborious old unblocking system which I knew would be time consuming. Lo and behold on September 1st, I can unblock seats with just a click!!! So happy! How did ThunderTix know? Just another example of listening to their clients and being proactively thinking ahead! I will always highly recommend ThunderTix to anyone looking for a straightforward, user-friendly, customer friendly, intuitive ticketing system, and I truly appreciate all the time and effort Stacy, Pam, and all the staff and programmers obviously put into their jobs. Well done, and THANK YOU!

title: I am now conducting my second ticket campaign for a chorus with audiences of 300-700.
name: Ken V.
comments:
Comments: I am a low volume user and not a professional so my learning curve may be slower than usual. Here are a few impressions that I have.

PROS:

1. My contact, Pam Mason, is very prompt and helpful.

2. When things are in place there seems to be no calculation errors of any sort.

3. The reports have lots of valuable information and help us keep up with stats.

4. The "Forum" is very helpful.

5. The cost is very fair.

NEEDS:

1. A graphics section to build auditorium maps with.

2. A whole auditorium view to see seat availability without changing screens. This would quicken "at the door" sales because customers could choose their seats more easily.

3. More clarity on using email notifications. If there is a cost involved it should show before one has to click the button and decide.

4. A way to run fake credit card test transactions without involving the gateway. This would make it easier to train staff.

5. I have not been able to "void" tickets which I should be able to do within 24 hours according to your information.

6. When emailed tickets fail to "send" there is no error message.

7. PC computers seem to have glitches in printing. My MacBook allows me to just hit "Print Tickets" but my PC seems to have to go back to where I can make the tickets appear as a PDF.

8. The "See All Dates" button needs to appear on many pages such as when one is looking at "Orders", "Customers", etc.

name: Lauren W.
comments: Comments: Down here in Gruene, Texas we are always "gently resisting change", but in 2010 it was time for our ticketing system to evolve to keep up with our now technology savvy customers. Back then, the Thundertix features were few but we didn't need anything fancy - just a reliable ticketing system that was user friendly. However, it didn't take us long to have a wish list for features, and Dawn and Stacy considered each of our requests regardless of how big or small. They are a fantastic partner to work with, and we always feel like a VIP customer. Now in 2015, they call us to make sure we are aware of new features to help better our customer's experience or minimize our labor. We greatly appreciate the Thundertix Team, and I would highly recommend ThunderTix for online ticketing needs!

title: In comparison to other systems
name: Chris G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ease of use for someone new to the system. Intuitive
cons: Cons: Unable to use packages and the shopping cart feature. With multiple packages, we have to run multiple charges for a customer, can raise concern.

title: Gets the job done
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Allows me to create tickets and email reminders for various events. I like being able to create tickets and have them go live at pre-set dates. I like being able to track who purchased tickets and when. I like being able to create sales and activity reports.
cons: Cons: The software is effective but klugy to use. For example, when inputing an event address and time, instead of one entry, I'm required to enter in three separate places: the event description, the ticket, the listing of events.
overall: Overall: It makes possible the creation of tickets for multiple events at different times.

title: Our use of ThunderTix software has made our ticket sales so much easier
name: Vance E.
pros: Pros: It is fairly intuitive to set up our ticket sales. I have been impressed with all the features for setting up multiple nights, etc. Our customers have found the interface to be straight forward and easy to operate. cons: Cons: It is not very easy to block out unavailable seats for certain nights, or reduce the cost of a seat in the case of an obstructed view.
overall: Overall: Ease of ticket sales seat up. Configuration of seating plans. Reporting features.

title: I found this software to be workable and easily tailored. The Customer Service is extraordinary.

Overall, however, we are very pleased. Pam is a tremendous help and always ready with just the answer we need.

Pros: The ease of use for both the customer and the theater.

title: Robust, Flexible, and Best Customer Service
name: Sally S.
comments: Comments: My company runs a small event series several days a year. We're a small company and we're not a venue, so we really need a flexible ticketing system that has a strong customer service department to make up for our lack of expertise and personnel. ThunderTix perfectly fits our needs for that reason. Any time one of us has a question about how to use the software, the ThunderTix team quickly provides us with solutions in a professional and friendly manner. We looked into the "big name" competitors for our ticketing needs and found ThunderTix to be more affordable, be more flexible, and have better support. Two thumbs WAY up for ThunderTix!!

title: Thank you ThunderTix!!
name: Vicki C.
comments: Comments: Shadowlight Theatre is very pleased with the ticketing and customer service ThunderTix offers. The website is very easy to use on the admin side as well as the customers. When we have questions that cannot be answered on the website help feature, customer service is prompt, efficient, and very friendly. The reports are accurate easy to download and simple to use. We enjoy using the Mail Chimp integration to market to our existing customers. The up load to Mail Chimp is very fast and has saved us hours of input work! We are very pleased with the continual upgrades to the website... it just keeps getting better! THANK YOU!!

title: I've done the research & ThunderTix is the best.
name: Jim S.
comments: Comments: When we opened our theatre in 2010, we were using an industry-leading software (that shall remain nameless) that was costing us a ridiculous amount of money. In 2012, after hefty research on the competition, we switched to ThunderTix for budget reasons, and though it started off a bit bare-bones, the amount of growth and the personalized attention to our needs has been nothing short of stellar. Pam & Stacy are amazing to work with, and the price is absolutely unbeatable. There are still features the bigger guys have that Ttix doesn't, but the company is constantly growing and improving, and I'm a very satisfied customer.

title: Great product, great company
name: Deirdre R.
pros: Pros: Great service, little downtime, lots of flexibility, terrific communication from the team, and very responsive to questions and suggestions.
cons: Cons: This is not the least expensive software on the market. But you get what you pay for, and with this software you get a real quality product.

title: Newport Walking Tours review
name: Brad H.
comments: Comments: We have been very impressed with the commitment to ongoing improvements by Thundertix. Our company switched to a different ticketing system for almost a year. The reason for the switch was primarily cost driven. The rival service advertised similar features but the reality was far from what was advertised. The customer service was nonexistent with the other company. Thundertix has been very responsive with technical support and advice on how we can improve the ticketing experience for our customers. I would recommend Thundertix to any company that wants a reliable way to sell and manage tickets to their events.

title: Best in the business!
name: Joanna C.
comments: Comments: HCCC has used Thundertix for four concerts now - two concerts in one venue and the other two in our current venue. The setup process for each concert as well as for each venue was very easy. Customer service has been consistently excellent - questions are answered quickly and accurately. Our guests have expressed their appreciation for some of the features Thundertix offers, such as the reminder email for upcoming concerts. Leadership is looking forward to using the survey feature for our current concert in April. I give Thundertix the highest rating possible!

comments:
Comments: Pros: very user friendly, easy to set up, excellent reporting features.

Cons: Pages are a bit slow to load, cannot purchase different prices/days at the same time (unless all are general admission).

The setup was a snap and the ease of use can't be beat, but the load time does need to be a bit faster. It would be nice to do different sections/days/priced events in the same shopping cart also. But overall, fantastic!

We have handed this off to our client & our client is thrilled about the ease of use, the reports, and the customization for their events & shows! A+ service + software all-around! Highly recommend!

recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Once I used the software for a couple of events I became comfortable with using all the features of the software. It's simple to learn and use.

Our theatre would highly recommend their service to anyone.

Customer service has been excellent.

title: very satisfied with all

pros: Pros: ease of use and customer support. reports were useful and easy to customize

title: Great experience
name: Jared T.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The software was very easy to use and navigate (even for someone who had no experience with it previously).
cons: Cons: I would appreciate a short tutorial, just to help guide someone new to ThunderTix.
overall: Overall: Great!

title: It is a very easy software to use for managing a larger events ticket sales. Customer support great
name: Paras P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ease of use and ability to customize based on our needs. Very good customer service. Easy to setup various accounts for multiple users at a time. Ability to access it on cell phone and Web anywhere
cons: Cons: Summary report features can be improved. Mobile app needs to be more quick and efficient with more privileges for users

title: Excellent,
name: Christian P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: For me what sold it was the support, the support I received was just outstanding, I felt that they did care and wanting to help me sort out all my concerns however small they might be.

title: Thunder Tix is Awesome!
name: Mandi R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Thunder Tix was super easy to use. I had never used any ticket management software before and it was very easy to navigate and keep track of our ticket sales!
cons: Cons: There were no cons for me! My experience was great!

title: Great for Small Business
name: Heather A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It is easy and quick for us as a small business. I think the price is right for us
cons: Cons: The interface could use some work, but it doesn't affect its effectiveness

title: First Southern Review
name: Mitch R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It does what it says it will do
cons: Cons: No phone support for lower plans
overall: Overall: I tried Eventbrite and hated that I could not talk to anyone. I switched to Thundertix and have appreciated the experience.

title: ThunderTix
name: Julie A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The product was easy to use and I could print out the reports I needed easily.
cons: Cons: Would have liked a better menu layout

title: Great for managing tickets at events
name: Alicyn D.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: it's very intuitive and has a very well built out help system. It's also flexible so we have been able to tune it to meet our needs. The support is VERY responsive
cons: Cons: Only thing is that they won't allow PayPal as a way for members to purchase tickets. We didn't realize that when we signed on.
overall: Overall: We're a small non-profit run by all volunteers. Managing our events has been a nightmare. With ThunderTix our ticketing pretty much manages itself and saves us hours of work. It's also extremely affordable.

title: The website is so easy to use, the value is magnificent and is absolutely wonderful!!!
name: Gina K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ease of use, the way it is setup - the menu is easy, clear, concise, easy to navigate, looks good as well

title: I used Thundertix to sell entrance into a workshop
name: Elissa F.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: What I like most about Thunder Tix is that it got the job done that I needed to have done. I was able to sell tix to my event
cons: Cons: What I like least about thunder tix is that it is not at all user friendly! It is difficult to navigate and not intuitive.
overall: Overall: It accomplished the goal I was looking to accomplish.
